title: "Mountain Climbers"
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(crotchet)
read_graphviz_chunk("team-structures", "evoteams")
```

```{r team-structures, engine="dot", fig.width=2}
```

```{r}
results <- read_csv("experiment-1.csv")
ggplot(results, aes(time, fitness, color = team)) +
  geom_line(stat = "summary", fun.y = "mean") +
  scale_color_manual(labels = letters[1:5], values = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(5, "Blues")) +
  facet_wrap("strategy")
```
